items: Proven track record of optimizing database performance and implementing innovative solutions to meet business objectives.
Excellent communication skills demonstrated through effective collaboration with stakeholders and team members.
Proven leadership qualities, having mentored junior developers and led teams in delivering successful database solutions.
Familiarity with SQL Server Profiler for capturing and analyzing SQL Server events, queries, and performance metrics.
Knowledgeable in performance tuning and optimization using SSMS tools like query execution plans and database engine tuning advisor.
